title: please help
body: soo ive been saving up BE for a while to change my name former "Merda life" to jhineric marksman since i want to one trick jhin with the upcoming skin PROJECT:jhin but as you can see from my name i somehow fergot the c in jhineric is there any chance you can add it for me that would be such a cool gesture

replies.body: It looks like someone actually already has the summoner name JhinericMarksman so we won't be able to swap those names =\ . If you're the one that created both accounts though, reach out to our account team and they should be able to help!
